first.question: You are on your way home. You are waiting for the bus at the bus stop. The bus arrives at the stop.
answers: You let the others standing at the stop go in front of you and get on the bus after them.
You push in front of other people to get on the bus first.

Käytäväpaikka.question: There are a lot of people on the bus. All window seats are reserved.
answers: You go to sit in the hallway next to an unknown person
You stay standing near the center door of the bus.

Ikkunapaikka.question: You get to sit by the window seat. The bus fills up pretty quickly and an unknown person sits next to you.
answers: You ask her when she gets off the bus.
You are quiet and looking out.
You lie that you will stay at the next stop and ask her to give up.

Käytäväpaikka 2.question: More people get on the bus. The bus will be completely full.
answers: You sit in peace in your seat until it's time for you to leave.
You get up from the bench and let someone else sit in your seat.

Poistuminen.question: The bus arrives at your stop. There are a lot of people in the hallway.
answers: You push people, yank yourself to the door and step out of the bus.
You push people lightly, apologize when you pass them and get off the bus.

Aikainen poistuminen.question: You step to the doors
answers: You get off the bus, even if it's not your stop.
You wait for your own stop at the door.

Keskiosa.question: A woman with a stroller gets on the bus, and you are in front of the stroller.
answers: You go past the stroller and get off the bus, even though it’s not your stop.
You will stand still.
You dodge the stroller and go to stand in the hallway.

Rattaat.question: The woman looks at you and rudely asks "can you move?", How do you answer?
answers: "Yeah, sorry", you move to the hallway.
"What the fuck are you shouting about, I was here first".
You say nothing and you go to the hallway.

Rattaat eskalointi.question: The man nearby pushes you lightly and says, "Dodge, let the lady come in."
answers: You get angry and get off the bus.
You reluctantly go to the hallway.

Ikkunapaikka keskustelu.question: You infer from her answer that you will be the first to get off the bus.
answers: You wait for your own stop.
You lie about staying at the next stop and asking her to dodge.

Ikkunapaikka oma pysäkki.question: The bus will arrive shortly at your stop.
answers: You move enough to make her feel like you are about to leave.
You tell the person sitting next to you that you will leave at the next stop.
You sit in your seats and go past your own stop.

Ohi.question: The person sitting next to you gets off the bus and you can get off the bus yourself.
answers: Leave the bus
